** - Site will use featured videos as main source of revenue. Featured videos must be free from obnoxious and malicious content. **
** - Enjoy! **

5_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4.body: **UPDATE: KopyKate now uses TorrentMedia as the standard client for new film releases. This should speed up torrents significantly. TorrentMedia is better than WebTorrent.Desktop for mass-seeding, but it surprisingly works faster if it is minimized compared to Windowed mode. This might have something to do with the CPU and bandwidth consumption of certain Node.js modules. **

> [robin](#comment_1_16KbrDtZC4YXAc9nCy7qT47h6CXFMhmfDE): Any way to easily view the movies in webtorrent.desktop?How can i help seed the movies?

Yep. If you just click on the Magnet icon under the video player, it will immediately download to WebTorrent.Desktop, if you have it installed. Otherwise, just right click on the magnet icon, copy link address .. and then Open Torrent Address in the torrent client. cheers

**UPDATE:**
**- Added new TV show BrainDead. All past episodes are currently being encoded for online streaming. Once it's finished, new episodes will be added as soon as they're released.**
**- Improved seeding of KopyKate torrents thanks to additional software testing.**
